title: Troubleshooting - IPTV Pixelation
description: A customer reports that their TV service is frequently pixelated, especially on HD channels.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and their TV package.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the customer has the 'Premium HD' TV package.

tasks.description: Run a remote diagnostic on the customer's set-top box and home internet line.
tasks.expected_outcome: Diagnostic shows high bandwidth utilization on the internet line.

tasks.description: Advise the customer to reduce other internet activity (e.g., large downloads) while watching TV or consider a speed upgrade.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the root cause and provides actionable advice.
